item.title: Report E-2025030435
item.description:
Report E-2025030435

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-15T00:53:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-26
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 28, 2025, one (1) 1-gallon pail of UN3266 had a loose cap and released approximately 0.25-gallon of product to the surrounding cardboard and loading dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the site. The crew utilized cleaners and absorbents to remediate the dock floor. The damaged pail and all impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 5-gallon pail for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2025031357
item.description:
Report X-2025031357

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-15T00:53:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-21
  • City: BUFORD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED FIVE FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF SEM XXX SPECIALTY GEL ADHESIVE REMOVER, EACH AT 14.74 OUNCE. THE PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS AN ADDITIONAL ONE QUART CONTAINER OF FLAMMABLE SEM RUST TRAP CLASSIFIED AS UN1263 PAINT, PG III. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2025031365
item.description:
Report X-2025031365

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-21
  • City: ATLANTA
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER PULLED UP TO A WET PACKAGE. RESPONDER PLACED THE WET PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TRAY AND CHECKED THE AREA FOR ANY LOOSE LIQUID AROUND AND FOUND NONE. THEN, BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING.
